actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Mineral Resources and Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Mineral Resources Development and Production

official_title: A bill to provide for the use of unobligated abandoned mine land funds by the State of Kentucky, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Office of Surface Mining Reclamation and Enforcement to make available to the State of Kentucky certain unobligated Abandoned Mine Land Funds for use by such State for Butler County water project activities.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the use of unobligated abandoned mine land funds by the State of Kentucky, and for other purposes.
